app.revision_history: Minor bug fixes for raptor and hpr support
app.name: x2rp
app.author: Xilinx, Inc
app.summary: This app helps in creating and managing designs with 2 RPs.

proc.name: hpr
proc.summary: Implements the HPR (Hierarchical Partial Reconfiguration) design using DCP files as sources.

proc.name: open_checkpoint_for_dsa_generation
proc.summary: Opens routed design checkpoint in the current project context for DSA generation.

proc.name: raptor
proc.summary: Implements the 2RP Design using DCP files as sources.
